text: Carmen Campagne (September 8, 1959 â€“ July 4, 2018) was a Canadian singer and children's entertainer. She, along with Connie Kaldor, received a Juno Award at the 1989 in the category Best Children's Album for Lullaby Berceuse. She was born in Willow Bunch, Saskatchewan. In 2013, she was made a Member of the Order of Canada "for her contributions as a singer, songwriter and composer enhancing music for young children and using music in French-language education". Campagne died of pancreatic cancer at age 58 on July 4, 2018, in Willow Bunch.Canadian singer-songwriter Carmen Campagne dies of cancer at age 58 ==References== Category:1959 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Canada Category:Canadian singers Category:Musicians from Saskatchewan
title: Carmen Campagne
